verses.text: \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* cometh \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, \w with|strong="H0935"\w* dyed \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* Bosra, \w this|strong="H2088"\w* beautiful \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w robe|strong="H3830"\w*, walking \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w greatness|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H7230"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w*, \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* defender \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* then \w is|strong="H3830"\w* thy \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w* \w red|strong="H0122"\w*, and thy \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* like theirs that \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* \w in|strong="H3830"\w* \w the|strong="H1869"\w* winepress?

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w trodden|strong="H1869"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* winepress \w alone|strong="H0905"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Gentiles \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w trampled|strong="H7429"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* indignation, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w trodden|strong="H1869"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w down|strong="H7429"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* blood \w is|strong="H0369"\w* sprinkled \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w stained|strong="H1351"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* apparel.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H0935"\w* redemption \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0369"\w* \w looked|strong="H5027"\w* about, \w and|strong="H8074"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w help|strong="H5826"\w*: \w I|strong="H0369"\w* sought, \w and|strong="H8074"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* give aid: \w and|strong="H8074"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* own \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* hath \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* \w for|strong="H1931"\w* \w me|strong="H3467"\w*, \w and|strong="H8074"\w* \w my|strong="H3467"\w* indignation \w itself|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* \w me|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w trodden|strong="H0947"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H3381"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w made|strong="H7937"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w* \w drunk|strong="H7937"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H3381"\w* indignation, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w brought|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w their|strong="H3381"\w* strength \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tender \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath bestowed \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2898"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath given \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Surely|strong="H0389"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* deny: \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* saviour.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* affliction \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* troubled, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*: \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w love|strong="H0160"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2551"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w old|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* provoked \w to|strong="H2015"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* afflicted \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w One|strong="H1931"\w*: \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w to|strong="H2015"\w* \w be|strong="H1931"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w old|strong="H5769"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w Where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*? \w where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6944"\w* One?

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w brought|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w by|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \w by|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* majesty: \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w divided|strong="H1234"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w himself|strong="H4325"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* led them out through \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w deep|strong="H8415"\w*, as \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* stumbleth \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* goeth \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* field, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* leader: \w so|strong="H3651"\w* didst thou lead thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* thyself \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w glorious|strong="H8597"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w Look|strong="H7200"\w* \w down|strong="H5027"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w habitation|strong="H2073"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w place|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H1995"\w* thy \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*: \w where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H0346"\w* thy \w zeal|strong="H7068"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* thy \w strength|strong="H1369"\w*, \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* \w of|strong="H1995"\w* thy \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w of|strong="H1995"\w* thy \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w*? \w they|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* held \w back|strong="H0413"\w* themselves \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w been|strong="H5769"\w* ignorant \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w*: thou, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, art \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*, \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* hast thou \w made|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w err|strong="H8582"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*: \w why|strong="H4100"\w* hast thou hardened \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w that|strong="H4616"\w* \w we|strong="H7725"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w not|strong="H1870"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* thee? \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sake|strong="H4616"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5971"\w* have \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* thy \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* as nothing: \w our|strong="H0947"\w* enemies have \w trodden|strong="H0947"\w* \w down|strong="H0947"\w* thy \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*.

We \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* beginning, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* thou didst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* we \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.
